DC CODE ยง 1-137.03

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: The Commission shall appoint staff as needed who shall be paid from the Fund.
Upon request of the Commission, the Mayor may detail staff, at no cost to the Commission, at any time to assist the Commission in carrying out its duties.

part.text: Home Rule Act 40th Anniversary Celebration and Commemoration.
